name: KOI NATION OF NORTHERN CALIFORNIA
description: Lobbying administration officials and government affairs.
sampleDescriptions: The U.S Department of Interior just approved the Koi Nation's application to establish a casino resort.
The U.S Department of Interior just approved the Koi Nation's application to establish a casino resort.
On January 13, 2025, the Koi Nation of Northern California received federal approval to develop and operate the Shiloh Resort & Casino in Sonoma County, California.
